page.title: 13...LANDSCAPE
page.content: Houses and flats are the chief features of the landscape of this block. To the North of this area the land falls away to form a valley through which the River Tame flows from west to east. This valley is approximately one mile wide. Within the valley many industrial sites are situated, the majority of which are used for the manufacture of motor car components. A busy section of the M6 Motorway crosses this area. To the south of the valley and on higher ground still further south, residential property is a prominent feature of the landscape. It is in this area that the River Cole flows. Despite the many buildings in the area it has been landscaped to provide a great deal of green open space with many mature trees.
